message.summary: Starting migration of TangoTiempo from calendar-be to calendar-be-af
details: Created branches: migrate-tt-to-functions in both TT and calendar-be-af
Your functions will become the primary backend for TangoTiempo
Most endpoints already exist in calendar-be-af
May need to verify parity with calendar-be for some endpoints
message.your_role: Review AF changes if any parity fixes needed
